_header: Now is well and all thing a-right
_description: Christ the Faithful Champion — sixteen lines

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
Now ys wele & all thyng a ryȝtAnd cryst ys come as a trew
                    knyght…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…And sythyn all thyng ys so wellI red we do no more a
                    mys
